text: vanankalum pumiyum (tattam ellaiyiliruntu) vilakivitatapati tatuttuk kontiruppavan niccayamaka allahtan. (Tam ellaiyil iruntu) avvirantum caya murpattapotilum avai cayatapati tatukkakkutiyavan allahvait tavira veroruvanumillai. Niccayamaka avan porumaiyutaiyavanaka, mannipputaiyavanaka irukkiran
